wikipedia_page.main: Neil Robson (born 30 December 1957) is a British sprint canoer who competed in the early to mid-1980s. At the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, he was eliminated in the semifinals of both the K-2 500 m and the K-2 1000 m events.

response: * Neil Robson (politician) (1928–2013), Tasmanian member of parliament, 1976–1992
